channel.title: How to do random forest on Rishabh Kumar

item.title: What are Random Forest?
item.description: no Random forest algorithm helps us to classify items into various groupings.There are two kinds of random forest algorithms: one for regressiona and one for clasifications. Both have similar underlying philosophies. Before getting into random forest its important to know the workings of the Decision tree algorithm. It works in a way to find features that will split the data in resulting groups that are as different from each other and the memebers of th these groups are as similar to each other as possible.
